errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.reportText: Please help us improve by reporting this error on
errorBoundary.copyInstructions: Copy and paste the following error message to include it as part of your submission:

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: We'd love to hear your feedback or help with any issues you're experiencing.

errors.fix_attempts: Failed to fix syntax after {{attempts}} attempts. Last error: {{error}}
errors.no_fix_provided: LLM failed to provide a fix

success.imageDataUriCopied: Image data URI copied to clipboard

hub.title: Agent Hub
hub.empty: Create a room to begin a group conversation.
hub.noMessages: Introduce the topic or invite your agents to begin.
hub.composePlaceholder: Share context or a new objective…
hub.noRoomSelected: Create or select a room to begin your collaborative session.
hub.addEmployeesFirst: Add employees to your workspace before starting a hub session.
hub.noAvailableEmployees: Everyone from {{company}} is already in this room.
hub.employeeValidation: Name and role are required to update this teammate.
hub.manageEmployeesEmpty: Add employees to your workspace first.

chatsHub.title: Chats Hub
chatsHub.placeholder: We'll configure the Chats Hub experience here soon.

brainstorm.title: Brainstorm Hub
brainstorm.subtitle: A calm place for Endless Surfaces—sketch roadmaps, map systems, and keep your best ideas in flow.
brainstorm.historyDescription: Revisit earlier surfaces or spin up something new.
brainstorm.empty: No surfaces yet. Start a new one to capture ideas.
brainstorm.missing: We couldn’t find that Endless Surface.
brainstorm.summaryPlaceholder: Add a sentence or two so teammates know what lives here.
brainstorm.agentToolDescription: Add the {{toolName}} tool ({{group}}) to orchestrate it from the canvas.
brainstorm.agentToolDescriptionFallback: Add the {{toolName}} tool to orchestrate it from the canvas.
brainstorm.canvasComingSoon: Canvas view is on its way
brainstorm.canvasPlaceholder: Soon you'll be able to sketch nodes, drag connections, and invite agents right from here. For now, capture the intent above so the surface is ready when creativity strikes.
brainstorm.shortcutsHint: Use these shortcuts to work faster on the canvas.

confirmation.deleteWarning: Deleting this message will delete all subsequent messages in the conversation. Do you want to proceed?
confirmation.editWarning: Editing this message will delete all subsequent messages in the conversation. Do you want to proceed?
confirmation.editQuestionWithCheckpoint: Editing this message will delete all later messages in the conversation. Do you also want to undo all changes back to this checkpoint?
confirmation.deleteQuestionWithCheckpoint: Deleting this message will delete all later messages in the conversation. Do you also want to undo all changes back to this checkpoint?
